Description: Limestone ostracon: On one side only, a partly faded drawing in black of the god Ra-Horakhty; in front of him a column of hieroglyphic text, giving his name and epithet, and two cartouches containing the royal names of Ramses IV.
Curator's comments: Bib: R.J. Demaree, Ramesside Ostraca (London, 2002), p.30, pl.102
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393028) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393028)
